provision.label: Provision in %
provision.tooltip: How much provision you want to keep per try?

jackpotFileName.label: Jackpot Filename
jackpotFileName.tooltip: Jackpot File Name. File has to be inside plugin itself

slotmachineSound.label: Slotmachine Sound Filename
slotmachineSound.tooltip: Slotmachine Sound File Name. Leave empty to disable. File has to be inside plugin itself!

command.label: Slotmachine command
command.tooltip: Command for everyone to start slotmachine. Default !slotmachine

commandGive.label: Give price command
commandGive.tooltip: Command for Caster to give a price. Default !giveSlot. Syntax is !giveSlot <<user>> <<amount>>

commandReset.label: Reset Jackpot command
commandReset.tooltip: Command for Caster to reset the whole jackpot. Default !resetSlot

languageErrorRoundLmit.value: Error! The rounds has to be between {0} and {1}!
languageErrorRoundLmit.label: languageErrorRoundLmit

languageErrorNotEnoughMoney.value: You need at least {0} {1} for this command!
languageErrorNotEnoughMoney.label: languageErrorNotEnoughMoney

languageErrorCooldown.value: Slotmachine is still in cooldown. Try again in {0} seconds!
languageErrorCooldown.label: languageErrorCooldown

languageJackpotTime.value: {0} want to spin the slotmachine {1} times for {2} {3}. Jackpot is now {4}!
languageJackpotTime.label: languageJackpotTime

languageJackpotRefill.value: Jackpot was empty and now refilled with {0} {1}.
languageJackpotRefill.label: languageJackpotRefill
